name: Mika Drakolis
title: Mathematician, Developer, Dragon
expirience: This is my main area of expertise. I've built almost anything: from simple blogs, to complex CRMs, from common rest applications, to pretty unusual socket-based chats. I had experience with both SSR and single-page applications, and usualy took part in both frontend and backend development. I must admit, that my frontend skills are kind of lower than backed, but I still try to develop both of further.

I had some experience in software testing, mostly because my teams usually lacked a designated Autotest Engineer, or he sometimes needed help and support from a frontend/backend person to get things done. This was not my main area of work, but I sometimes had to write, rewiev or improve internal testing tools, so I do understand a lot of things here.

Even though it's just a hobby, I always wanted to be a real game developer. I was always into games, had some ideas of my own, but always lacked resources to create something. For now it's just a dream, but who knows what will happen tomorrow.
